Name: Chessсakе
About the game: Classic board game in a computer version. A variant of English drafts. The goal of the game is to collect all enemy checkers. Rules: Simple checkers go only forward to the next field It is obligatory to take a checker under battle. A simple checker can turn into a lady if she reaches the last opposite horizontal row of the board.
